article.headline: Pepperdine 86, Texas-Pan American 84
article.story: BOZEMAN, Mont. (AP) -- Tyrone Shelley scored 19 points off the bench and Pepperdine held on to beat Texas Pan-American 86-84 Friday night. Malcolm Thomas added 16 points and Jason Walberg 14 for the Waves (4-4), who trailed 40-39 at halftime before edging ahead over the final 20 minutes in the first round of the MSU GranTree Inn Classic. Brian Burrell scored a game-high 23 points for Texas-Pan American (4-3). Zach Trader added 19 points and Paul Stoll had 13. The teams were almost evenly matched. Pepperdine shot 34-of-59 from the field (57.6 percent) to 27-of-51 for Texas Pan-American (52.9 percent). But the Waves had a slight rebounding edge and forced the Broncs into 17 turnovers.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.
